mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id, m.nick_name, m.img_url, m.title, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(hl.letter) FROM hidden_letter AS hl JOIN letter_collection AS lc ON lc.hidden_letter_id = hl.hidden_letter_id WHERE lc.member_id = m.member_id) AS letters FROM puzzle_team_member AS pm JOIN member AS m ON pm.member_id = m.member_id WHERE pm.puzzle_team_id = #{teamId} AND pm.approve = 1;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO puzzle_team_member (member_id, puzzle_team_id, approve) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{teamId}, 1 )
mapper.update: UPDATE puzzle_team_member SET approve = 1 WHERE member_id = #{memberId} and puzzle_team_id = #{teamId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM puzzle_team_member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} and puzzle_team_id = #{teamId}
